title: Ardougne teleport (tablet)

properties.value: The Ardougne teleport is a magic tablet that can be broken by players to teleport to East Ardougne. Using the tablet requires completion of Plague City.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ardougne teleport (tablet)
This article is about the teleport tablet. For the teleport spell, see Ardougne Teleport.
 This article has a money making guide: Creating Ardougne teleport tablets.
Please add tips to the subpage, rather than the article below.

Item ID8011

The Ardougne teleport is a magic tablet that can be broken by players to teleport to East Ardougne. Using the tablet requires completion of Plague City.

Players with level 51 Magic can create this item on a Teak eagle lectern or better in a player-owned house. This requires 2 law runes, 2 water runes, and 1 soft clay. Creating a tablet grants 61 Magic experience, the same as casting the Ardougne Teleport spell. Elemental staves can be substituted for runes and are recommended when making teleport tablets in large groups at a time.

As with all teleport tablets, using an Ardougne teleport tablet does not grant any experience.

[[File:Ardougne teleport (tablet) detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Ardougne teleport''' is a [[magic tablet]] that can be broken by players to [[Teleportation|teleport]] to [[East Ardougne]]. Using the tablet requires completion of [[Plague City]].

Players with level 51 [[Magic]] can create this item on a [[Teak eagle lectern]] or better in a [[player-owned house]]. This requires 2 [[law rune]]s, 2 [[water rune]]s, and 1 [[soft clay]]. Creating a tablet grants 61 Magic experience, the same as casting the Ardougne Teleport spell. [[Elemental staves]] can be substituted for [[runes]] and are recommended when making teleport tablets in large groups at a time.

As with all teleport tablets, using an Ardougne teleport tablet does not grant any experience.
